VisitVisaSubHeader1Desc1: The medical visitors' insurance policy is issued as part of visit visa requirement for visitors coming to Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, it provides the medical care for emergency medical conditions through a wide network of hospitals and medical clinics.
VisitVisaSubHeader1Desc2: The policy is effective as soon as the visitor enters the Kingdom. This insurance could be easily extended during visitor's stay through the website of Aljazira Takaful.
VisitVisaSubHeader1Desc3: The policy also covers cases of Covid 19 infection, including the costs of medical isolation, medical evacuation, and repatriation of the deceased to his original country. Excluding PCR test.
VisitVisaSubHeaderDesc2Point1: All of our products are compliant with the Islamic Sharia Law
VisitVisaSubHeaderDesc2Point5: Wide Medical Network covering entire Kingdom.
VisitVisaSubHeader3: The benefits and limit of coverage
VisitVisaSubHeader3CovItem1: The maximum benefits limit for each person for the duration of the policy and that includes lower limits specified in this policy
VisitVisaSubHeader3CovItem2: The expenses of examination and treatment of emergency cases
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpItem3: Accommodation and daily subsistence limit for the patient which include bed wage, nursing services, visits, medical supervision and life support services, but it does not include the cost of medicines and medical supplies, as prescribed by the physician
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpValue3: (shared room and up to a limit of SR 600/day)
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpValue4: (shared room and up to a limit of SR 150/day)
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpItem5: Treatment of emergency maternity and delivery cases
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpValue5: Up to SR 5000 during policy term
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpItem6: Cost of travel and accompanying of one direct family member
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpValue6: Up to SR 5000 during policy term
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpValue7: Up to SR 500 during policy term
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpItem8: The expenses of the birth and treatment of premature babies
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpItem9: Treatment to injuries resulting from road traffic accidents
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpItem10: The expenses of emergency kidney Dialysis
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpItem11: Emergency Medical Evacuation inside and outside the Kingdom
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpItem12: Repatriation of body to the country of origin
VisitVisaSubHeader3HosExpValue12: Up to SR 10,000 during policy term
